item.description:
You can still support Ron Paul with your individual expenditures even if you have already reached your donation limit to the official campaign and/or to a PAC.


The cost of the Boston Globe ad is $49,532. .

This ad is already paid for but you can still contribute by credit card to help pay for associated outstanding costs (design and layout for example) and for ongoing grasssroots' activities.

Ad donors will be listed in alphabetical order under the heading "This ad
paid for by.." They are:
Alida Bailey
Richard Blanchard
Michael Burke
Thomas Curry
Joseph and Evelyn Caetano
Renato D'amico
Jason Fane
Judy Gray
Adrianne Jackson
Anthony Lilja (
Arthur Massucco
Christopher Nelson
Blake Roberts
Donald Stacey
Mr and Mrs. Anthony B. Ryan ,
Steve Ryan
James Shimer
Joe Ureneck
Mark Venezia
Christopher Wagner
George Yiachos ,
Mary Young
(Total $49,532.08).

Thank you to all those who contributed!

Questions? Please write jureneck@comcast.net or call 617 436-0320 (H) or 617 435-2057 (c)

Contribute by credit card.
item.why: To encourage voters in Massachusetts to cast their vote for Ron Paul in the Primary on Tuesday, Feb. 5.
item.name: SUCCESS! Full-page Ron Paul Ad in Boston Globe
